Posts.Content: Jul 3, 2009 05:18PM migot48 wrote: Thank your for writing Tender...let me tell you that my mom was already administered those medications....she is feeling ok up to now and is optimistic. Do you know something about this? I pray God so that my mom can overcome this terrible disease. Thank you for your heartfelt wishes. Milton Gomez
